name: Muzic Road
description:
Feel the beat and dodge the obstacles you're approaching. Everything moves to the music's rhythm, so plug in your headphones and start (rock &) rolling!

Game Features
- Simple one-handed drag controls
- 15 awesome songs
- 15 unique balls
- 4 completely different endless worlds
- Rhythm-based gameplay

How to play
Move your finger over the screen to drag the ball. Feel the rhythm of the songs and avoid being hit by any obstacles on your way.

Endless Mode
Finishing a full song lets you play to it again at a higher speed.
The road is endless, so travel as far as you can, feel the music and beat your friend's score!
